page.title: 16Appleby Cub Pack
page.content: The Cubs are very popular in Appleby because almost every time you go to Cubs you engoy yourself .But as well as enjoying yourself you also earn badges.I have done between 5 and 10 badges at Cubs I enjoyed doing the cookery badge because I like the smell of the food.Our main leader is Joyce Brockbank who we call Akela. The Cub hut is quite small but it seems bigger on the inside. It has a kitchen,a toilet,and a hall where we play the games.We also earn ourselves badges eg,atheletes badge-jump one metre run 80 metres in a certain time. We play good games at Cubs such as British Bulldogs.We have to run to the other side of the room without being caught.If the person who is it manages to lift you fully off the ground then you are a bulldog as well until everybody is caught.Carl Sowerby
